description: Fukuyama attends Mizuno High also and is Yukinari`s classmate. He has good looks and athletic ability but has a twisted personality. Fukuyama is arrogant, non-cooperative and cares only about himself. He constantly has girls on his mind and harasses girls such as Miharu, Koyomi and Kirie by making aggressive and unwanted advances towards them. Deservedly, Kirie, beats him up daily. The white gloves he wears are to hide his allergy of men and how he will faint if a man accidentally touches him. He is from a billionaire family and no men are allowed in his home.
name: Fukuyama Kazuharu
